agent

Class AgentServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.AgentServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAgentServer

    public class AgentServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAgentServer
    An agent server accepts TCP socket connections on a server port to receive agents.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_BASE_PORT
      The default port used for receiving UDP discovery messages.

      The default port used for listening for incoming TCP messages

      Creates a new AgentServer by setting up the threadpool, scheduling the server discovery service, and running the main server loop.
